main.name: Kiup Kim
main.bio: I am coming from 3.5 years of experience in retail banking focused on customer service. I have always been interested in technology and wanted to explore what I can do with technology. I decided to leave my position at the bank and pursue full-time studies to learn software development and would love to start a position as a junior developer to gain industry experience.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my best skills!

education.description: Full Stack Web Development Diploma with a focus on Javascript, React.js, HTML, and CSS on the Front End. Node.js, Express, Axios, and Ruby on Rails in the Back End. PostgreSQL for the database.

work.title: Junior Developer
work.description: Executed front end  software development using JavaScript (React, Axios) and CSS/SASS. Executed server-side software development using PHP (Laravel). Wrote and implemented useable and tested code with REST and associated technologies with autonomy (JWT, JWE, JSON-API, etc). Researched and refined skillset with container technologies such as Docker. Strong understanding of software development workflows (writing, testing and deploying code).

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Develop a bluetooth integrated mobile-application to scan and connect a sensor device.Used React-Native and BLE PLX library to build and design the application. Developed End to End testing using Cypress to ensure quality and efficiency of the application

work.title: Personal Banking Associate
work.description: Understand client needs and guide the client to the right contact person for appropriate solutions while exercising good judgment in confident matters. Build client confidence in emerging digital banking trends by educating them on mobile, ATM, and online banking. Actively look for areas of improvement in the workflow process and escalate to appropriate management.

projects.title: Personal Financial Planner
projects.category: Financial budgeting App built with React

projects.title: Jungle-Rails
projects.category: Mini E-Commerce App built with Ruby on Rails

projects.title: Interview Scheduler
